Class stepsTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • fitnessApp.dbConnection
      • fitnessApp.stepsTable

  • public class stepsTable
extends dbConnection
    This class extends the dbConnection class to connect to the Steps Table in the database

    12/5/18
    Author:
    Carson Uecker-Herman
